document.full_text: yuri milner, who has invested hundreds of millions of dollars in facebook, zynga and groupon, said on wednesday exits by founders of companies should be a cue for investors to do the same.
document.title: facebook investor milner sees founder exits as cue
lines_and_colors: yuri milner, who has invested hundreds of millions of dollars in facebook, zynga and groupon, said on wednesday exits by founders of companies should be a cue for investors to do the same.
